example_sentence_english: I am looking for a sturdy anchor.
The chain of the anchor is long.
We are going to the spare anchors.
The rope starts from the anchor.
A noise comes from the anchors.
There is sand in the anchor.
There is rust in the anchors.
I put the mark on the anchor.
We are working on the anchors today.
I pull the boat with the anchor.

example_sentence_english: I travel with the spare anchors.
